::KitKat::

She then ordered her clone to come to the conference room. The clone 
walked into the room and stood behind KitKat.  She smiled, rather 
pleased with her work. "It's an exact copy of you, Council member 
Megatron. This clone will lead us into battle, alone with my clone. 
Aracnia,"she turned to face her,"We shall make you one as well.  
These clones will lead our troops. This way, we won't be at risk. 
What do you think of your present Megatron?"
